name: Geom Runner
description:
Geom Runner is a very simple hyper casual runner like game that puts the player in a randomly generated map. The goal is to last or run as far as the player can while building a score as big as possible using distance and coin combos.

The player can also be upgraded to last longer and use energy more sparingly. 

In the end this is the first game project I finished thanks to the FFS Game Jam. There is still lots to be done and will appreciate any feedback and critique.
